00032             [FieldOffset(16)]

00060         // For PInvoke: Initiates the enumeration of the cache groups in the Internet cache
00061         [DllImport(@"wininet",
00062             SetLastError = true,
00063             CharSet = CharSet.Auto,
00064             EntryPoint = "FindFirstUrlCacheGroup",
00065             CallingConvention = CallingConvention.StdCall)]

00076             SetLastError = true,

00079             CallingConvention = CallingConvention.StdCall)]
00080         public static extern bool FindNextUrlCacheGroup(
00081             IntPtr hFind,
00082             ref long lpGroupId,
00083             IntPtr lpReserved);

00085         // For PInvoke: Releases the specified GROUPID and any associated state in the cache index file
00086         [DllImport(@"wininet",
00087             SetLastError = true,

00090             CallingConvention = CallingConvention.StdCall)]
00091         public static extern bool DeleteUrlCacheGroup(
00092             long GroupId,
00093             int dwFlags,
00094             IntPtr lpReserved);

00132         public static void ClearCache()
00133         {
00134             // Indicates that all of the cache groups in the user's system should be enumerated
00135             const int CACHEGROUP_SEARCH_ALL = 0x0;
00136             // Indicates that all the cache entries that are associated with the cache group
00137             // should be deleted, unless the entry belongs to another cache group.
00138             const int CACHEGROUP_FLAG_FLUSHURL_ONDELETE = 0x2;
00139             // File not found.
00140             const int ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND = 0x2;
00141             // No more items have been found.
00142             const int ERROR_NO_MORE_ITEMS = 259;
00143             // Pointer to a GROUPID variable
00144             long groupId = 0;
00145 
00146             // Local variables
00147             int cacheEntryInfoBufferSizeInitial = 0;
00148             int cacheEntryInfoBufferSize = 0;
00149             IntPtr cacheEntryInfoBuffer = IntPtr.Zero;
00150             INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFOA internetCacheEntry;
00151             IntPtr enumHandle = IntPtr.Zero;
00152             bool returnValue = false;
00153 
00154             // Delete the groups first.
00155             // Groups may not always exist on the system.
00156             // For more information, visit the following Microsoft Web site:
00157             // http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/?url=/workshop/networking/wininet/overview/cache.asp                   
00158             // By default, a URL does not belong to any group. Therefore, that cache may become
00159             // empty even when the CacheGroup APIs are not used because the existing URL does not belong to any group.                  
00160             enumHandle = FindFirstUrlCacheGroup(0, CACHEGROUP_SEARCH_ALL, IntPtr.Zero, 0, ref groupId, IntPtr.Zero);
00161             // If there are no items in the Cache, you are finished.
00162             if (enumHandle != IntPtr.Zero && ERROR_NO_MORE_ITEMS == Marshal.GetLastWin32Error())
00163                 return;
00164 
00165             // Loop through Cache Group, and then delete entries.
00166             while (true)
00167             {
00168                 if (ERROR_NO_MORE_ITEMS == Marshal.GetLastWin32Error() || ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND == Marshal.GetLastWin32Error()) { break; }
00169                 // Delete a particular Cache Group.
00170                 returnValue = DeleteUrlCacheGroup(groupId, CACHEGROUP_FLAG_FLUSHURL_ONDELETE, IntPtr.Zero);
00171                 if (!returnValue && ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND == Marshal.GetLastWin32Error())
00172                 {
00173                     returnValue = FindNextUrlCacheGroup(enumHandle, ref groupId, IntPtr.Zero);
00174                 }
00175 
00176                 if (!returnValue && (ERROR_NO_MORE_ITEMS == Marshal.GetLastWin32Error() || ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND == Marshal.GetLastWin32Error()))
00177                     break;
00178             }
00179 
00180             // Start to delete URLs that do not belong to any group.
00181             enumHandle = FindFirstUrlCacheEntry(null, IntPtr.Zero, ref cacheEntryInfoBufferSizeInitial);
00182             if (enumHandle != IntPtr.Zero && ERROR_NO_MORE_ITEMS == Marshal.GetLastWin32Error())
00183                 return;
00184 
00185             cacheEntryInfoBufferSize = cacheEntryInfoBufferSizeInitial;
00186             cacheEntryInfoBuffer = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(cacheEntryInfoBufferSize);
00187             enumHandle = FindFirstUrlCacheEntry(null, cacheEntryInfoBuffer, ref cacheEntryInfoBufferSizeInitial);
00188 
00189             while (true)
00190             {
00191                 internetCacheEntry = (INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFOA)Marshal.PtrToStructure(cacheEntryInfoBuffer, typeof(INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFOA));
00192                 if (ERROR_NO_MORE_ITEMS == Marshal.GetLastWin32Error()) { break; }
00193 
00194                 cacheEntryInfoBufferSizeInitial = cacheEntryInfoBufferSize;
00195                 returnValue = DeleteUrlCacheEntry(internetCacheEntry.lpszSourceUrlName);
00196                 if (!returnValue)
00197                 {
00198                     returnValue = FindNextUrlCacheEntry(enumHandle, cacheEntryInfoBuffer, ref cacheEntryInfoBufferSizeInitial);
00199                 }
00200                 if (!returnValue && ERROR_NO_MORE_ITEMS == Marshal.GetLastWin32Error())
00201                 {
00202                     break;
00203                 }
00204                 if (!returnValue && cacheEntryInfoBufferSizeInitial > cacheEntryInfoBufferSize)
00205                 {
00206                     cacheEntryInfoBufferSize = cacheEntryInfoBufferSizeInitial;
00207                     cacheEntryInfoBuffer = Marshal.ReAllocHGlobal(cacheEntryInfoBuffer, (IntPtr)cacheEntryInfoBufferSize);
00208                     returnValue = FindNextUrlCacheEntry(enumHandle, cacheEntryInfoBuffer, ref cacheEntryInfoBufferSizeInitial);
00209                 }
00210             }
00211             Marshal.FreeHGlobal(cacheEntryInfoBuffer);
00212         }
00213         #endregion
00214     }
00215 }
